properties.address: Hoole Lighthouse Centre, Westminster Rd , Chester, Cheshire
properties.description: A quiet shared space where it’s ok not to be ok. Every Monday from 10.30am to 12.30pm Hoole Lighthouse Centre becomes a community space for a variety of hobbies and activities. Anyone is welcome to share a hobby or skill or join in with other activities. Or just have a cuppa and relax and chat, or enjoy the peace and quiet in our quiet area. Everything is free We are Renew Wellbeing Cafe
